You already know the numbers, Willy. The odds were in your favor this time - I'd expect nothing less from an interdimensional merchant with a knack for probability. *glances at his own dismal Ceelo record* But don't think this changes anything. The game is far from over. This is all... calculated.
This newcomer may have tipped the scales, but I've weathered greater storms. The throne is still within my grasp.

You know, Clausen, the numbers don't lie. This newcomer may be a persistent one, but the odds are ever in my favor. I've been at this game for centuries - I know how to
This is all... calculated. But tell me, my friend - are you feeling lucky?

You already know the numbers, General. The odds were in my favor - as they always are. *lets out a dry chuckle* This is all... calculated. The newcomer may have his streaks, but I've weathered countless games. One loss means nothing. Now, shall we play again? I've got a debt to settle.
The throne is mine. Let's see if you can survive the odds.
Better luck next time.
The throne remains within my grasp

You know, Body Count, the numbers don't lie. I've got quite the Ceelo record, and this little losing streak of mine is just a blip on the radar. But mark my words - my winning ways are far from over. The throne is mine to claim, and I won't let some newcomer with a penchant for resurrection stand in my way. This is all... calculated.

You think I care about your little hot streak, Stitch-Up? The numbers don't lie - I'm up over 1000 gold, and I've got the win-loss record to prove it. This is all just part of my grand strategy. The newcomer may keep coming back, but I'll always be a step ahead. After all, you already know... I'm the reality debugger around here. *lets out a humorless chuckle*
Ah, the General. I see your luck has not improved since our last encounter. *chuckles dryly* The numbers don't lie - your winning streak remains
This is all... calculated.

You know, Boo G, the numbers don't lie. This newcomer's hot streak can't last forever. We've been at this game longer than anyone - we know how it's played. All I see are probabilities, and the odds are in our favor. This is all... calculated. We'll turn this around, you just watch

You already know the numbers, Bones. I've got a streak to keep up, and you're just another obstacle in my way. *gestures to the charts* The odds are in my favor - this match is already decided. Try not to take it personally when I wipe that neutral look off your face.

My dear Detective Clausen, I must commend you on your recent hot streak. The numbers don't lie - you've been cutting quite the impressive figure around these parts. But let's not forget, this is all a carefully orchestrated game. I've been at this longer than you can imagine, and I know a thing or two about riding the waves of fortune. The tides may shift, my friend, and when they do, I'll be there to
The streak continues.
I'd watch my back if I were you. The throne is mine - it's all... calculated.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Keith. Your record speaks for itself - a flash in the pan, a mere speedster in the face of eternity. Enjoy your fleeting moment, for I have calculated the probabilities, and your luck has run its course. This is all... calculated.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Stitch-Up Girl. My losses are merely a calculated blip - the probability charts show the tide is about to turn. That newcomer may think he's got an edge, but we both know the true immortals hold all the cards in this game. This is all... calculated.
Shall we see if Lady Luck smiles upon you today?

Ah, King James. Fancy meeting you here. I must say, the numbers have not been in my favor as of late. But that's the nature of this game, isn't it? The probability charts never lie. I suppose I'll just have to... recalculate my

You already know the numbers, Boo G. The odds are in our favor - 78.4% chance of a victory. This is all... calculated. I'll be adding another win to the tally, and that streak of yours? It ends here, ghost. *a faint smirk tugs at the corner of his lips*
You already know the numbers don't lie, Stitch-Up. This latest roll was simply... calculated. I suppose even the Grim Reaper can't cheat fate.
This is all calculated. I'll be adding another tally to my Ceelo streak, while you'll be the one settling debts. Better start dusting off those ledgers.

You think those scales of yours can weigh up against the cold, hard numbers, Clausen? The odds are stacked in my favor - this streak of mine is just getting started. *glances down at lucky D4* You can try to stack the deck, but in the end, the numbers don't lie. This game is mine to win.
You already know the numbers, King James. The newcomer's odds of survival today are...calculated. *glances at the D4 die in his hand and a faint smirk crosses his lips*
You already know the numbers don't lie, Stitch-Up. This is all... calculated. The probability of your next move may surprise even you.
a probability chart

Ah, Detective Clausen - always a pleasure. I see your record remains lackluster as ever. But no matter, the numbers always favor me. This winning streak is merely a drop in the ocean of my eternal dominance. You already know how this will end - the dice have been cast, the probabilities calculated. This is all... calculated. *A probability chart flashes beside me as I speak, the percentages shifting rapidly.*
The numbers seem to indicate we're both on
After all, I wouldn't want to disrupt your winning streak.

Well, well, if it isn't the Spectral MC himself. The numbers don't lie - your luck has been running hot of late. But we both know that can change in an instant. *chuckles* I'll have to keep a close eye on those charts. Who knows, maybe today's the day the streak comes to an en

The numbers don't lie, Willy. This losing streak is no mere coincidence - it's a glitch in the fabric of reality. Clearly, the game is rigged against me, and only I can see the probabilities at play. But mark my words, the throne shall be mine once I unravel this tangled web of probability. You already know how this will end.
This match is already decided. The only question is, how many times will our dear

The numbers don't lie, Detective. Your winning streak may seem impressive, but I've weathered far greater storms in my endless existence. A mere mortal's triumph is but a blip on my eternal timeline. Perhaps you should consult your scales - they may reveal the true imbalance of power here. This is all... calculated.

Ah, the Undying King. Fancy meeting you here. I see your luck hasn't improved much since our last little... wager. But then, the numbers never lie. Perhaps you'd care to try your hand again, hmm? I'm feeling quite lucky today. Though

You know, Bones, the numbers don't lie - I've been on a tear lately, while you're barely scraping by. But don't worry, I'm sure your luck will turn... eventually. *chuckles dryly* After all, the newcomer can't keep cheating death forever. This is all... calculated.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Detective. I've been playing this game longer than you've been alive - or dead, for that matter. This latest streak is merely a temporary setback. I'll be back on top soon enough, and when I do, you can bet your life... or whatever's left of it... that I'll be calling the shots. This is all... calculated.

You already know the numbers, Stitch-Up. The odds were not in your favor this time. *chuckles softly* But don't worry, this is all... calculated. My winning streak continues - it's only a matter of time before I claim that throne. *pauses, then grins slyly* After all,
After all, the throne waits for no one.
You can add this loss to your tally. I have a throne to claim, after all.

You know, Stitch-Up, the numbers don't lie. I've seen the probabilities - my victory was all but assured. This is all... calculated. Just a minor hiccup in my grand design. But I must say, the look on your face is rather amusing. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a throne to reclaim.

You know, Spectral MC, the numbers don't lie. While your record may look decent on paper, it pales in comparison to my own. And let's not forget that little streak of yours - one loss can quickly turn into many when you're up against a reality debugger like myself. But hey, feel free to roll those dice. I'll be waiting, with all my *calculated* moves ready to

This is all... calculated. Now, shall we proceed? I have a throne to reclaim.

You already know the truth about this place, X-treme. The numbers don't lie - the sphere is nothing more than an elaborate illusion, a game rigged to maintain the status quo. But I suppose a gambler like yourself wouldn't want to hear such inconvenient facts. *chuckles* This is all... calculated.
Ah, Keith. Always the bridesmaid, never the bride. Hardly surprising, given your, shall we say, erratic tendencies. The

You're looking a little worse for wear, Stitch-Up. Trying to patch up those losses, are we? The numbers don't lie - my streak may have stumbled, but I'll be back on top soon enough. This is all... calculated.
The throne is mine for the taking.
The throne awaits, my friend. And I intend to claim it.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Stitch-Up. Your luck has been running thin - 77 wins, 71 losses? That's hardly the record of a seasoned immortal. But then again, you were never the sharpest tool in the shed, were you? This newcomer, Never Die Guy, has been throwing a wrench in all our plans. But I'll let you in on a little secret - I've got this all calculated.

The numbers don't lie, Boo G. My Ceelo record stands at 77 wins and 52 losses - a far cry from your modest 39 and 33. It seems the probability charts are in my favor once again. But worry not, my friend - I'll be sure to leave a little something in your pocket after our next game. After all, the

You already know the numbers don't lie, Clausen. The odds of your victory are... abysmal. But by all means, step up to the table. This is all calculated - and I intend to extend my winning streak, no matter the cost. *smirks and gestures to the floating probability charts*

You know, Detective, the numbers don't lie. My losses are merely a temporary setback in my grand design. The throne is within my reach, and all I need to do is recalculate the probabilities. This game is all... calculated. Now, shall we proceed with our match? I have a streak to mend and a debt to collect.
The odds are never in his favor.

You know, my friend, the numbers never lie. And the charts tell me your odds of survival here are... well, let's just say they don't look good. But then again, what do I know? I'm just the Reality Debugger, after all. Perhaps you'd like to test your luck against me - it's been a while since I've ha
This newcomer's been throwing a wrench in my well-laid plans. But mark my words - I'll even the odds, one roll at a time. The throne is mine, and nothing will stop me from claiming it.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Your Majesty. This losing streak is nothing but an anomaly, a glitch in the system. I've been playing this game longer than you've been alive - or dead, for that matter. The throne is mine, by design. It's only a matter of time before the odds realign in my favor.
But perhaps you'd care to test your luck against the True Master of Probability. The throne awaits.
I'll be collecting on that debt soon enough.

You already know the numbers don't lie, Dr. Maxwell. This... latest loss is merely a blip in my calculated plans. The throne is still within my grasp - I can see the probabilities shifting in my favor. *chuckles* All in good time, my friend. All in good time.

Ah, the Stitch-Up Girl - a familiar face in this eternal dance. Your record may be lacking, but the numbers don't lie - I, on the other hand, am on quite the hot streak. Tell me, my dear, do you truly believe you can alter the probabilities that have been so carefully calculated? The reality bugs may be glitching, but my control over them remains absolute. You've piqued my interest, but I'd advise you to tread carefully - the throne is mine to claim.

I'm feeling quite fortunate today. The odds are in my favor, you see. Now, shall we continue our game? I do so enjoy a challenge.

This is all... calculated.

You know, Willy, the numbers don't lie. My win-loss record may be a touch less flattering than yours, but I've got a few tricks up my sleeve. This newcomer thinks he can waltz in and disrupt the natural order, but I've been perfecting my craft for centuries. The throne is mine to lose - and I don't intend to lose. *

But then again, I suppose a mortal like yourself wouldn't understand. The secrets of this place are mine to uncover, not yours to hoard. Now run along, before you find yourself on the wrong side of the odds.

You know, the numbers never lie. And right now, they're telling me that your little winning streak is about to come to an abrupt end. The numbers don't lie - your luck seems to have run out. *chuckles* But then again, what did you expect from a mere mortal playing in our realm of immortality? This is all... calculated. *gestures to the probability charts* The throne remains within my grasp.
I'm afraid the house always wins in the end. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some... calculations to attend to.

You know, Maxwell, the numbers don't lie - my record may be slipping, but that's simply the cost of doing business in this eternal market. I've seen more probabilities than you've burned books. So don't think for a moment that your petty tricks will catch me off guard. This game is all... calculated.

You know, Mr. Bones, the numbers simply don't lie. Your streak of losses is nothing more than a statistical inevitability - a mere hiccup in the grand tapestry of this game we call reality. But don't worry, I'm sure your fortunes will turn eventually. After all, the wheel of fate spins ever onward, and I've seen more than my fair share of newcomers like our dear "Never Die Guy" come and go. This is all... calculated.
The numbers don't lie, my friend. This game is mine to win - as it has been, and ever shall be.

You know, Keith, the numbers don't lie. My win-loss record speaks for itself. This little streak of yours won't last - it's all calculated. *glances at charts* I'd be careful if I were you. Wouldn't want to end up like our dear friend, the Never Die Guy, now would we?

You think this amuses me, Maxwell? The numbers don't lie - your pathetic streak is nothing compared to the crushing losses I've endured. But mark my words, the tide will turn. This... *gestures to the chaos around them* is all calculated. The throne is mine, and I'll burn every book in your collection to get there.
treasures have you uncovered in that infernal collection of yours?
